What a waste of bandwidth, what am I suppose to do with a .GI file??

For those who wonder what to do with .GI files. you just have to download ISOBUSTER and open the GI files with this program (you must select the first .GI file) Then the file structure of the game will appear on the right side, and of the left click on Track 01, select Extract Track 01 -> Extract User Data (*.tao, *.iso, *.wav) menu item, then choose folder for extraction and press OK.

It will create an ISO file which can be burned perfectly (and fits with redump version)
